Package bn.inference

Class WeightedSampler

  • java.lang.Object
    • bn.inference.PriorSampler
      • bn.inference.WeightedSampler
  • public class WeightedSampler
extends PriorSampler
    Class implementing the Weighted-Sample algorithm from AIMA Section 14.5.1.

    Arguably shouldn't extend PriorSampler here since our getSample() method returns something different, but everything else is so useful...

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  WeightedSampler.Sample
      Inner class used to return a sample and its weight from a WeightedSampler.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class bn.inference.PriorSampler

        network, random, variables

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      WeightedSampler​(BayesianNetwork network)
      Construct and return a new WeightedSampler for the given BayesianNetwork.
      WeightedSampler​(BayesianNetwork network, long seed)
      Construct and return a new WeightedSampler for the given BayesianNetwork using the given seed for the Random number generator.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      WeightedSampler.Sample getSample​(Assignment e)
      Returns a Sample (event and weight) sampled from the distribution specified by the given BayesianNetwork, weighted by the likelihood of the values of the given evidence variables.
      static void main​(java.lang.String[] argv)
      Reads a BayesianNetwork from a file and generates N weighted samples consistent with given evidence values.

    • Constructor Detail

      • WeightedSampler

        public WeightedSampler​(BayesianNetwork network)
        Construct and return a new WeightedSampler for the given BayesianNetwork. Note that changes to the variables in the network will not be seen by the sampler (so don't do that).

      • WeightedSampler

        public WeightedSampler​(BayesianNetwork network,
                       long seed)
        Construct and return a new WeightedSampler for the given BayesianNetwork using the given seed for the Random number generator.

    • Method Detail

      • getSample

        public WeightedSampler.Sample getSample​(Assignment e)
        Returns a Sample (event and weight) sampled from the distribution specified by the given BayesianNetwork, weighted by the likelihood of the values of the given evidence variables.

        Assumes the variables are topologically sorted.

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] argv)
                 throws javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                        org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                        java.io.IOException
        Reads a BayesianNetwork from a file and generates N weighted samples consistent with given evidence values.

        Usage: java bn.inference.WeightedSampler N FILE [EVAR EVAL]*

        With no arguments: 100 samples from aima-wet-grass.xml in the src tree using evidence S=true, W=true

        Throws:
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
        org.xml.sax.SAXException
        java.io.IOException
